headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on Sumo (Remix)
content:
The rules are simple, but the terrain is subject to major change. Sumo (Remix) pits you against your competitors in a mad dash for a shrinking, moving safe zone with bits of track disappearing at random along the way. Survive or fall to your doom â€“ either way, players will earn 3X GTA$ and RP.

To launch Sumo (Remix), head to the Online tab in the Pause Menu. Locate Rockstar Created and discover Sumo (Remix) missions in the Adversary Mode menu list.
